channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 参议院通过临时法案，延长政府拨款并避免部分停摆，拜登将签署该法案
item.description:
The Senate passes a stopgap bill that will extend government funding and avert a partial shutdown, clearing it for Biden's signature https://t.co/tveOxroPm3

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 1, 2024

item.title: 被控在网上发布机密文件的空军国民警卫队队员杰克-特谢拉（Jack Teixeira）预计将认罪。
item.description:
Jack Teixeira, the Air National Guardsman accused of posting classified documents online, is expected to plead guilty.https://t.co/CWiiYzKYJm

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 得益于芯片制造商和人工智能股票，科技股占主导地位的纳斯达克综合指数收盘创下历史新高。
item.description:
The tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite index closed at an all-time record high, thanks to chipmaker and AI stocks.https://t.co/RY0Xop0ay8

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 众议院批准临时拨款法案，以避免政府明天部分关门。现在该法案将提交给参议院。
item.description:
House approves stopgap funding bill to avoid a partial government shutdown tomorrow. The measure now goes to the Senate. https://t.co/TiYMA7SbEY

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 特朗普就伊利诺伊州法官以第 14 修正案 "叛乱禁令 "为由将其从该州选票中删除的决定提出上诉
item.description:
Trump appeals an Illinois judge's decision to remove him from the state's ballot due to the 14th Amendment's "insurrectionist ban" https://t.co/ZAdsLKhM2g

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 联邦法官阻止执行一项有争议的移民法，该法将允许得克萨斯州逮捕涉嫌非法进入美国的人
item.description:
Federal judge blocks enforcement of a controversial immigration law that would let Texas arrest people suspected of entering the US illegally https://t.co/TPAjUBehzO

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 得克萨斯州潘汉德尔地区的一场野火面积已超过 100 万英亩，成为该州历史上有记录以来最大的火灾
item.description:
A wildfire in the Texas Panhandle has grown to more than 1 million acres, becoming the largest blaze on record in state historyhttps://t.co/nkV7DalXA3

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 巴勒斯坦官员称，以色列国防军在加沙民众等待食物时开火，混乱事件造成至少 100 人死亡，700 人受伤
item.description:
At least 100 killed and 700 injured in chaotic incident where IDF opened fire as people waited for food in Gaza, Palestinian officials sayhttps://t.co/4lRDTbWmsc

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 卫生部称，自以色列对哈马斯发动战争以来，加沙已有 3 万多人丧生，以色列停止冲突的压力与日俱增
item.description:
More than 30,000 people killed in Gaza since Israel's war on Hamas began, health ministry says, as pressure grows on Israel to halt conflict https://t.co/XWQDwWlsqI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 得克萨斯州对 50 岁的伊万-坎图（Ivan Cantu）执行了死刑，他在 2000 年谋杀了自己的表弟和表弟的未婚妻。
item.description:
Texas has carried out the execution of 50-year-old Ivan Cantu for the murders of his cousin and his cousin's fiancée in 2000. https://t.co/XgepJ9EP8L

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一名官员说，得克萨斯州潘汉德尔地区的火灾已造成至少一人死亡。其中一场野火烧毁了超过 85 万英亩的土地。关注实时更新。
item.description:
At least one person has died as a result of fires in the Texas Panhandle, an official says. One of the wildfires has scorched over 850,000 acres. Follow live updates. https://t.co/sCiaYqqGZ5

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 卡车司机协会和安海斯-布希公司避免了 5000 名工会成员罢工，这次罢工威胁到全国最大啤酒酿造商的运营
item.description:
Teamsters and Anheuser-Busch avert a strike by 5,000 union members that threatened operations at the nation's largest brewer https://t.co/6QMHquXIsP

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 伊利诺伊州法官出人意料地以 "叛乱禁令 "为由将特朗普从选票中删除。该判决被暂停执行，以便特朗普有时间提出上诉。
item.description:
In surprise move, Illinois judge removes Trump from ballot based on "insurrectionist ban." The decision is paused, giving him time to appeal. https://t.co/I8qdf9kBTB

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 29, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统的医生在总统年度体检后报告说，拜登总统 "健康状况良好"，没有新的健康问题。白宫表示，总统的医疗团队认为没有必要进行认知检查。
item.description:
President Biden is "fit for duty" with no new health concerns, his doctor reported following the president’s annual physical. The White House says a cognitive exam was deemed unnecessary by president's medical team. https://t.co/iSlQL5OCSb

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最高法院同意就特朗普是否可在特别顾问的 2020 年大选颠覆案中要求豁免做出裁决，进一步推迟对他的审判
item.description:
Supreme Court agrees to decide whether Trump may claim immunity in special counsel's 2020 election subversion case, further delaying his trial https://t.co/4fFOnl0bpL

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 国会领导人在最后期限前两天就政府拨款问题达成协议。众议院可能于周四对此进行表决。
item.description:
Congressional leaders strike a deal on funding the government just 2 days ahead of a critical deadline. The House could vote on it Thursday.https://t.co/n93ydef1rx

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 喜剧演员理查德-刘易斯（Richard Lewis）去世，享年 76 岁。几十年来，他曾在《遏制你的热情》等节目中为观众带来欢乐。
item.description:
Comedian and actor Richard Lewis, who's entertained audiences for decades in shows like "Curb Your Enthusiasm," has died at 76 https://t.co/mkwcvWGtvJ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 上诉法院法官裁定，唐纳德-特朗普必须全额支付民事欺诈案的 4.54 亿美元判决保证金
item.description:
Donald Trump must come up with the full bond amount to cover the $454 million verdict in the civil fraud trial, appeals court judge rules https://t.co/oVMofjXBER

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州官员因无法设置静脉注射管路而停止对一名死囚执行死刑
item.description:
Officials in Idaho halted the execution of a death row inmate after they were unable to set an IV line to carry out a lethal injectionhttps://t.co/lFVWBmnyyc

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 米奇-麦康奈尔计划 11 月卸任参议院少数党领袖
item.description:
Mitch McConnell plans to step down as Senate minority leader in November https://t.co/2qMtnyRy8O

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 玛丽安-威廉姆森表示，她将取消民主党总统竞选活动，理由是拜登在与特朗普的潜在对决中处于弱势地位
item.description:
Marianne Williamson says she is unsuspending her Democratic presidential campaign, citing Biden's vulnerability in a potential matchup against Trump https://t.co/VtNYtzNPac

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 哈里王子辞去王室职务后，英国政府决定剥夺他由纳税人资助的保护权，哈里王子在法庭上对这一决定提出异议，但最终败诉。
item.description:
Prince Harry loses court challenge against UK government decision to strip him of taxpayer-funded protection after he quit royal duties https://t.co/1cI3h3vqIW

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，乔-拜登和唐纳德-特朗普将赢得密歇根州的总统初选，他们将继续向各自党派的提名迈进，并有可能在 11 月进行复选。
item.description:
Joe Biden and Donald Trump will win Michigan's presidential primaries, CNN projects, as they continue marching toward their parties' nominations ahead of a likely rematch in November https://t.co/A1ocEZ8OtR

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 密歇根州初选的民调开始接近尾声，特朗普希望加强对共和党候选人提名的控制，而拜登则希望在初选中表现出色。请收看 CNN 并关注实时更新。
item.description:
Polls are beginning to close in Michigan's primary elections as Trump looks to tighten his grip on the GOP nomination and Biden aims for a strong showing. Watch CNN and follow live updates. https://t.co/Bte6YuRpGI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 2002 年，两名男子被判谋杀罪名成立，Jam Master Jay 是开创性嘻哈三人组 Run-DMC 的先锋 DJ。
item.description:
Two men were found guilty of murder in the 2002 killing of Jam Master Jay, the pioneering DJ of the groundbreaking hip hop trio Run-DMC.https://t.co/gsdw8jKRIO

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一名关键证人将出庭作证，力争将富尔顿县检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）从特朗普的佐治亚州选举颠覆案中除名
item.description:

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 27, 2024

item.description:
US home prices hit an all-time high in December, according to data released Tuesday https://t.co/1bNbdCe1i9

item.title: 拜登总统表示希望以色列-哈马斯冲突在下周一前实现停火
